00108     public static function loadScripts( $oWidget = null, $sTheme = null )
00109     {
00110         static $_bLoaded = false;
00111 
00112         if ( ! $_bLoaded )
00113         {
00114             //  Daddy...
00115             parent::loadScripts( $oWidget, $sTheme );
00116 
00117             //  Instantiate if needed...
00118             $_oWidget = ( null == $oWidget ) ? new CPSjqUIWrapper() : $oWidget;
00119 
00120             //  Save then Set baseUrl...
00121             $_sOldPath = $_oWidget->baseUrl;
00122             $_oWidget->baseUrl = $_oWidget->extLibUrl . self::PS_EXTERNAL_PATH;
00123 
00124             //  Register scripts necessary
00125             $_oWidget->pushScriptFile( "{$_oWidget->baseUrl}/jquery.alerts.js", CClientScript::POS_END );
00126 
00127             //  Register css files...
00128             $_oWidget->pushCssFile( "{$_oWidget->baseUrl}/jquery.alerts.css" );
00129 
00130             //  Restore/set path
00131             $_oWidget->baseUrl = PS::nvl( $_sOldPath, $_oWidget->baseUrl );
00132 
00133             //  Mark done
00134             $_bLoaded = true;
00135         }
00136     }
